UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Design of stapled antimicrobial peptides that are stable, nontoxic and kill antibiotic-resistant bacteria in mice.
Literature.Author: Mourtada R, Herce HD, Yin DJ, Moroco JA, Wales TE, Engen JR,  Walensky LD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1.56µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=50µg/ml)
